attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-1247

Date: 2010-10-06

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 3(5) of the Canadian Dairy Commission Act, hereby fixes the remuneration of John Core, Chief Executive Officer, Canadian Dairy Commission, as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem is within the range ($830 - $975), effective August 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Greg Stewart, President, Farm Credit Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($281,400 - $331,000), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 7(1) of the Cape Breton Development Act, hereby fixes the salary of Ross Farquharson McCurdy, former President, Cape Breton Development Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($163,300 - $192,100), effective December 31, 2009.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 31(1) of the Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation Act, hereby fixes the salary of John Lynn, Chief Executive Officer, Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 3 ($169,900 - $199,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 12(1) of the Canadian Film Corporation Act, hereby fixes the salary of Carolle Brabant, Executive Director, Telefilm Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 4 ($203,800 - $239,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 6(3)(c) of the Bank of Canada Act, hereby fixes the salary of Mark Carney, Governor, Bank of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($417,900 - $491,600), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 6(3)(c) of the Bank of Canada Act, hereby fixes the salary of W. Paul Jenkins, former Deputy Governor, Bank of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($292,600 - $239,800), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to section 105 of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of John McBride, Chief Executive Officer, PPP Canada Inc., as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 4 ($203,800 - $239,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to section 9 of the International Development Research Centre Act, hereby fixes the salary of David Malone, President, International Development Research Centre, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($213,500 - $251,200), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 3.1(2) of the Canadian Commercial Corporation Act, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Whittingham, President, Canadian Commercial Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 4 ($203,800 - $239,800), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 9(2) of the Export Development Act, hereby fixes the salary of Eric Siegel, President, Export Development Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 6 ($293,500 - $345,300), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of William J. S. Elliott, Commissioner, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($209,800 - $246,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 8(2) of the Canada Post Corporation Act, hereby fixes the salary of Moya Greene, former President, Canada Post Corporation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 8 ($422,500 - $497,100), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of R. Anthony McGuinness, Chief Executive Officer, Atlantic Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($141,600 - $166,600), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108 (1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Robert Fernand Lemire, Chief Executive Officer, Great Lakes Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($141,600 - $166,600), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108(1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of RÃ©jean Lanteigne, Chief Executive Officer, Laurentian Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($141,600 - $166,600), effective January 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 108 (1) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby fixes the salary of Kevin G. Obermeyer, Chief Executive Officer, Pacific Pilotage Authority, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range CEO 2 ($141,600 - $166,600), effective January 1, 2010.
